citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:15 pm on
18-Oct-18.
Upon arrival at the facility inspector knocked and rang door bell. A facility representative was contacted by phone.
Business card was left on front door.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:15 pm on
18-Oct-18.
Upon arrival at the facility inspector knocked and rang door bell.  A facility representative was contacted by phone. 
Business card was left on front door.
